statements: SELECT * FROM movie_actors
SELECT actor_name, movie_title FROM movie_actors WHERE actor_id = 1
SELECT actor_name FROM movie_actors WHERE role_name = 'Hero'
SELECT * FROM movie_actors ORDER BY actor_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT movie_title FROM movie_actors

SELECT * FROM movie_actors WHERE actor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT actor_name FROM movie_actors ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM movie_actors GROUP BY actor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT role_id, character_name FROM roles WHERE movie_id = 5;

SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE character_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT actor_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_roles FROM roles GROUP BY actor_id HAVING number_of_roles > 3;
SELECT actors.first_name, roles.character_name FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id ORDER BY actors.last_name DESC, roles.character_name ASC;

SELECT actor_name, actor_id FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name ASC;

SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM actors JOIN actor_roles ON actors.actor_id = actor_roles.actor_id WHERE role_name LIKE 'Lead%';

SELECT actor_name, birth_date FROM movie_actors ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, movie_title, role_name FROM movie_actors JOIN actor_roles ON movie_actors.actor_id = actor_roles.actor_id JOIN movies ON actor_roles.movie_id = movies.movie_id;

SELECT * FROM movie_actors WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT movie_title, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM movie_actors INNER JOIN actor_roles ON movie_actors.actor_id = actor_roles.actor_id;
SELECT movie_title, genre_name FROM movies LEFT JOIN movie_genre ON movies.movie_id = movie_genre.genre_id;
SELECT actor_name, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM movie_actors INNER JOIN actor_roles ON movie_actors.actor_id = actor_roles.actor_id GROUP BY actor_name HAVING role_count > 1;

SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT title FROM movies WHERE title LIKE '%Avengers%';

SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT role_id, role_name, movie_id, actor_id FROM roles WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT actors.first_name, actors.last_name, movies.title, genres.genre_name FROM actors INNER JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id INNER JOIN movies ON roles.movie_id = movies.movie_id INNER JOIN movie_genres ON movies.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id INNER JOIN genres ON movie_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id ORDER BY actors.last_name ASC, genres.genre_name DESC;
